name: PeerMe MultiSig: Check User Role
title: Check user permissions
description: Verify a user's role and permissions in a MultiSig wallet. Determine if an address is a board member, proposer, or has no access. Roles determine what actions a user can perform.

inputs.name: User Address
inputs.description: The wallet address to check permissions for.

output.ROLE_NAME: transform:() => { const role = Number(results.ROLE); if (role === 0) return 'None'; if (role === 1) return 'Proposer'; if (role === 2) return 'Board Member'; return 'Unknown'; }

messages.success: User {{USER_ADDRESS}} has role: {{ROLE_NAME}}. Can propose: {{CAN_PROPOSE}}, Can sign: {{CAN_SIGN}}
messages.info: This address has {{ROLE_NAME}} permissions in the MultiSig wallet
